result.execSummary:
The defendant Michael A Shultis was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Bail Jumping-Misdemeanor, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(a).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes: Maintain absolute sobriety. Complete AODA and comply with all treatment recommendations. Complete psychological evaluation and follow all treatment and counseling recommendations, enroll in domestic abuse counseling.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Michael A Shultis

records.addlTxt: Defendant's probation terminated on 8-17-18; unpaid supervision fees of $20

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Letter from DA Kohlwey requesting a correction in the Judgment of Conviction
Filed by Atty Amanda Riek.
Filed by Atty Amanda Riek.

Cases called: 14CM683, 14CM657, 14CM619, 15CM172 & 15CM128, Defendant Michael A Shultis in court with attorney Amanda K. Riek.  Jane E. Kohlwey appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Court went over the rights & elements. Defendant pled no contest to count 1 in 14CM619, ct. 1 in 14CM657, ct. 2 in 14CM683, ct. 1 in 15CM128, ct. 1 in 15CM172. Court found defendant guilty, entered judgment, sentence withheld in all cases, 3 yr. probation, conds: Maintain absolute sobriety. Complete AODA and comply with all treatment recommendations. Complete psychological evaluation and follow all treatment and counseling recommendations, enroll in domestic abuse counseling. Court costs in 14CM619 are $543, inclusive of $100 domestic abuse surcharge, rest of cases, costs are $443 each case. Bond applied to all costs. All remaining counts are read in and dismissed.  Jail credit: 14CM657 is 1 day, 14CM683 is 4 days, 15CM128 is 4 days, 15CM172 is 8 days, none in 14CM619.
Plea/sentencing hearing at 08-17-2015 02:30 pm
